Desc.entry: An allotment society with a site of 115 plots that have been recently renovated. Members and associate members have access to a commercial polytunnel in which they can grow their own seeds etc. Plans to hold seed swaps and plant sales which will be open to the general public as well as organising other fundraising activities to help fund allotment projects.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Mosborough Miners Welfare & Wellbeing Social Club
